body_html: @fastlater If you want new features. you have to use the CI builds. Use the CI build at your risk. You may have to use CUDA 8.0 and cudnn 6 to make this work. Here is where you find the CI builds. APPVEYOR_BUILD_WORKER_IMAGE=Visual Studio 2017 is for Win10 and APPVEYOR_BUILD_WORKER_IMAGE=2015 is for Win7. Just select your environment and download through the artifact page there. Add the dir for nvToolsExt_1.dll into env variable PATH before using it.

body: @fastlater If you want new features. you have to use the CI builds.  Use the CI build at your risk. You may have to use CUDA 8.0 and cudnn 6 to make this work. [Here](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/peterjc123/pytorch-elheu) is where you find the CI builds. APPVEYOR_BUILD_WORKER_IMAGE=Visual Studio 2017 is for Win10 and APPVEYOR_BUILD_WORKER_IMAGE=2015 is for Win7. Just select your environment and download through the artifact page there. Add the dir for nvToolsExt_1.dll into env variable PATH before using it.
